update diningtable_order
Reserved_number = #{reservedNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where dep_Name = #{depName} and DiningTable_Id = #{diningtableId}
